title: Add an Endorsement to a Home Policy
description: A customer bought an expensive piece of jewelry and wants to add a scheduled personal property endorsement to their home policy to cover it.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and explain how a scheduled property endorsement works.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's policy and clearly explains the benefit of the endorsement.

tasks.description: Collect the details of the jewelry, including a recent appraisal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the required documentation for the high-value item.

tasks.description: Add the endorsement to the policy and calculate the additional premium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the endorsement and informs the customer of the cost.
